GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.4.225
GSD.description:
macvlan: enforce a consistent minimal mtu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.225 by commit a62aa84fe19eb24d083d600a074c009a0a66d4f3, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit 91572088e3fdbf4fe31cf397926d8b890fdb3237. For more details please see the references link.
